attributes.title: 💩🧚🏻Poopie bunker boy 🧚🏻💩
attributes.review: So as a fellow cult follower I was on the best app in the whole entire world, looking at my lord bunker boy. I was sitting on the toilet bbq sauce 🍗 on my tiddies, even tho I am a full blown homosexual. As I looked at my screen on my toothbrush because I got the new 5g network my screen turned bright orange. Next thing I know bunker boy slams my bathroom door open while I’m taking a big poop (oopsies stinky is here🥰). He tells me, that it’s his turn to go pottie. So I turn my 5g network off because he said it would give me cancer 🥺(oh no I say). It was a very sad day so I had to give it a 1 star because he scared me.

attributes.title: Hey... how y’all doin🧚‍♀️🧚🏻
